analyzed: theg pa gsum ni gnas pa bzhi la gnas te /

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas ni bye brag tu smra ba la gnas so //
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas ni bye brag tu smra ba la gnas so //

original: bye brag tu smra ba la yang gnyis te /
analyzed: bye brag tu smra ba la yang gnyis te /

original: nub phyogs bye brag tu smra ba dang / kha che bye brag tu smra ba'o //
analyzed: nub phyogs bye brag tu smra ba dang / kha che bye brag tu smra ba'o //

analyzed: de la tha ma dang 'bring bo ni nub phyogs kha che bye brag tu smra ba la gnas so //

original: rab dang rkyen rtog ni kha che bye brag tu smra ba la gnas so //
analyzed: rab dang rkyen rtog ni kha che bye brag tu smra ba la gnas so //

original: theg pa chen po la yang gnyis te /
analyzed: theg pa chen po la yang gnyis te /

analyzed: 'bring po'i so sor rtog pa dang lta ba ni snga ma bzhin no//
translated: The discernment and view of the middling person are the same as before.

analyzed: @165b 'di ni khyad par cung zad cig tsam sems can gyi don byed pa'o //
translated: This is just a slight difference in the benefit for sentient beings.

original: sgom pa ni dbugs la slob ste /
analyzed: sgom pa ni dbugs la slob ste /
translated: The meditation is training in the breath.

original: kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / reg bya la slob pa'o //
analyzed: kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / reg bya la slob pa'o //
translated: One trains in the color, shape, and tactile aspects.

original: kha dog la slob pa ni dbugs dkar po spa lcag gi tshad sor brgyad dam /
analyzed: kha dog la slob pa ni dbugs dkar po spa lcag gi tshad sor brgyad dam /
translated: Training in the color is counting the breath as white, the size of a whip, eight fingerbreadths,

original: bcu gnyis sam /
analyzed: bcu gnyis sam /
translated: twelve fingerbreadths,

original: sor bcu drug gam /
analyzed: sor bcu drug gam /
translated: sixteen fingerbreadths,

original: nyi shu rtsa bzhi'am /
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa bzhi'am /
translated: twenty-four fingerbreadths,

original: brgyad cu'am / ji tsam 'dod kyi bar du bgrangs la /
analyzed: brgyad cu'am / ji tsam 'dod kyi bar du bgrangs la /
translated: or eighty fingerbreadths, or however much one wishes.

original: tshur 'ong lte bar phyin par slob po //
analyzed: tshur 'ong lte bar phyin par slob po //
translated: One trains in the exhalation reaching the navel.

original: dbyibs la slob pa ni autpa la 'am /
analyzed: dbyibs la slob pa ni autpa la 'am /
translated: Training in shape is like the shape of an utpala flower.🔽

original: rdo rje lta bu la bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje lta bu la bya'o //
translated: Training in shape is like a lotus or a vajra.

original: reg bya la slob pa ni lte ba dang / sna sgor grang ba'i reg bya la slob cing bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: reg bya la slob pa ni lte ba dang / sna sgor grang ba'i reg bya la slob cing bsgom pa'o //
translated: Training in tactile objects is training in and cultivating the tactile object of coolness at the navel and the nose-tip.

original: bum pa gang ba ltar gang ba'i rlung gis srog dang rtsol ba bkag nas sems dran pa med par gyur pa ni sgom pa'i dri ma'o //
analyzed: bum pa gang ba ltar gang ba'i rlung gis srog dang rtsol ba bkag nas sems dran pa med par gyur pa ni sgom pa'i dri ma'o //
translated: The defilement of meditation is when the mind becomes without mindfulness through the wind filling up like a full vase and blocking the life-force and exertion.

original: de ni nub phyogs bye brag tu smra bar bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de ni nub phyogs bye brag tu smra bar bstan pa'o //
translated: That is the teaching on the western Vaibhāṣika.

original: nyan thos dbang po rab kyi so sor rtog pa ni phyi'i don khas len pa sngon du 'gro bas lus bdag med par lta zhing 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bsgom pas /
analyzed: nyan thos dbang po rab kyi so sor rtog pa ni phyi'i don khas len pa sngon du 'gro bas lus bdag med par lta zhing 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bsgom pas /
translated: The discernment of the highest faculties of the śrāvakas is preceded by the acceptance of external objects, and by viewing the selflessness of the body, they meditate on the four noble truths.

original: gang zag kyang stong pa nyid du 'dod cing phyi gzung ba ni stong pa nang 'dzin pa'i sems su 'dod pa ni so sor rtog pa'o //
analyzed: gang zag kyang stong pa nyid du 'dod cing phyi gzung ba ni stong pa nang 'dzin pa'i sems su 'dod pa ni so sor rtog pa'o //
translated: They assert that the person is also empty, and they assert that external objects are empty, and the internal mind is the apprehender. That is discernment.

original: de la sdug bsngal ba ni phung po'i rang bzhin te shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de la sdug bsngal ba ni phung po'i rang bzhin te shes par bya'o //
translated: Among those, suffering is the nature of the aggregates, which should be known.

original: kun 'byung ba ni rnam par rtog pa ste spang bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: kun 'byung ba ni rnam par rtog pa ste spang bar bya ba'o //
translated: The origin is discursive thought, which is to be abandoned.

original: 'dgog pa ni dbang po yul las log pa ste mngon du bya'o //
analyzed: 'dgog pa ni dbang po yul las log pa ste mngon du bya'o //
translated: Cessation is the withdrawal of the senses from their objects, which is to be realized.

original: khams gsum stong pa nyid ni mar ma bsad pa ltar bkag nas ci yang mi dmigs pa ni sgom pa'o //
analyzed: khams gsum stong pa nyid ni mar ma bsad pa ltar bkag nas ci yang mi dmigs pa ni sgom pa'o //
translated: The meditation is the emptiness of the three realms, which is like the killing of a mother: having prohibited it, one does not apprehend anything.

original: stong pa nyid dang rtag par sgro 'dogs pa ni bsam gtang yi dri ma'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang rtag par sgro 'dogs pa ni bsam gtang yi dri ma'o //
translated: The obscuration to meditative concentration is the superimposition of emptiness as permanent.

original: gzhan gyi don byed pa'i khyad par ni lta ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi don byed pa'i khyad par ni lta ba'o //
translated: The view is the distinction in the service of others.

original: 'di'i ' bras bu yang phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa dang lhag ma med pa'o //
analyzed: 'di'i ' bras bu yang phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa dang lhag ma med pa'o //
translated: The fruit of this is the remainderless and the remainderless-without-remainder.

original: lhag ma dang bcas ba ni 'dod chags spangs la lus nyid ma spangs pa'o //
analyzed: lhag ma dang bcas ba ni 'dod chags spangs la lus nyid ma spangs pa'o //
translated: The remainderless is the abandonment of attachment without the abandonment of the body.

original: lhag ma med pa ni 'dod chags pa dang lus gnyis ka spangs pa'o //
analyzed: lhag ma med pa ni 'dod chags pa dang lus gnyis ka spangs pa'o //
translated: The remainderless-without-remainder is the abandonment of both attachment and the body.

original: 'di ni nyan thos kyi byang chub bo //
analyzed: 'di ni nyan thos kyi byang chub bo //
translated: This is the enlightenment of the śrāvaka.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi so sor rtog pa ni nyan thos rab 'bring bzhin no //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi so sor rtog pa ni nyan thos rab 'bring bzhin no //
translated: The discrimination of the pratyekabuddha is like the best and middling of the śrāvakas.

original: yang 'di'i khyad par ni slob dpon med par rang 'byung gi ye shes ngang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
analyzed: yang 'di'i khyad par ni slob dpon med par rang 'byung gi ye shes ngang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
translated: The difference between this and the previous one is that here the self-originated intuition is inconceivable without a master.🔽And it is said:

original: de yang / rdzogs sangs rgyas ni mi 'byung zhing //
analyzed: de yang / rdzogs sangs rgyas ni mi 'byung zhing //
translated: The perfect Buddha will not appear,

original: nyan thos rnams dang 'das pa dang // rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni //
analyzed: nyan thos rnams dang 'das pa dang // rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni //
translated: and the intuition of the disciples and the transcendent lords

original: brten pa med par 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: brten pa med par 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: will arise without support.

original: zhe'o // 'di'i bsam gtan ni zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong ngo //🔽lhag mthong ni dbang po @166a * //
analyzed: zhe'o // 'di'i bsam gtan ni zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong ngo // lhag mthong ni dbang po @166a * //
translated: The meditation of this vehicle is serenity and insight.

original: yul gyi grong las bzlog pa'o //
analyzed: yul gyi grong las bzlog pa'o //
translated: Insight is the reversal of the senses from the city of objects.

original: zhi gnas ni lus dang / dag dang / yid yang dag par sngom pa 'di ni de'i sgom pa'o //
analyzed: zhi gnas ni lus dang / dag dang / yid yang dag par sngom pa 'di ni de'i sgom pa'o //
translated: Serenity is the correct restraint of body, speech, and mind. This is its meditation.

original: gnyid yur ba lta bur phyi'i spyod yul 'gags pa dang / gnyid stug po sems dang sems las byung ba shin tu 'gags pa ni sgom pa'i dri ma'o //
analyzed: gnyid yur ba lta bur phyi'i spyod yul 'gags pa dang / gnyid stug po sems dang sems las byung ba shin tu 'gags pa ni sgom pa'i dri ma'o //
translated: The defilement of meditation is the cessation of the external object-field like sleep, and the complete cessation of mind and mental functions like deep sleep.

original: lta ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: lta ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: View is as before.

original: 'di'i 'bras bu ni tshogs na spyed pa dang bse ru lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'di'i 'bras bu ni tshogs na spyed pa dang bse ru lta bu'o //
translated: Its result is the vehicle of the congregation and the vehicle of the rhinoceros.

original: yang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi snying rje yang sems can la dmigs pa'i snying rdze ste /

analyzed: 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang / 'gyur pa'i sdug bsngal lo //

analyzed: 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal ni tshor ba btang snyoms kyi ngo bo'o //

analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal ni tshor ba sdug bsngal gyi ngo bo nyid do //

original: 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal ni tshor ba bde ba'i ngo bo nyid de /
analyzed: 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal ni tshor ba bde ba'i ngo bo nyid de /
translated: The suffering of change is the nature of the feeling of pleasure.

original: 'di la dmigs shing snying rje byed pa ni sems can la dmigs pa'i snying rje'o //
analyzed: 'di la dmigs shing snying rje byed pa ni sems can la dmigs pa'i snying rje'o //
translated: Compassion that has this as its object is compassion that has sentient beings as its object.

original: kha che bye brag tu smra ba bstan pa de ste theg pa chung du mdor bstan pa'o //
analyzed: kha che bye brag tu smra ba bstan pa de ste theg pa chung du mdor bstan pa'o //

original: de nas gzhan yang theg pa chen po bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang theg pa chen po bstan par bya ste /
translated: Now, the Mahayana will be taught.

original: de la rgyu mtshan nyid kyi theg pa'i dbang po tha ma ni mdo sde pa'o //
analyzed: de la rgyu mtshan nyid kyi theg pa'i dbang po tha ma ni mdo sde pa'o //
translated: In the Mahayana of the characteristics, the one of lowest capacity is the Sautrantika.

original: de'i so sor rtog pa ni phyi rol gyi yul cha shas drug gis gzhigs na /
analyzed: de'i so sor rtog pa ni phyi rol gyi yul cha shas drug gis gzhigs na /
translated: The analysis of this is as follows: If external objects are dissected into six parts,

original: rags snang gi ngo bo med de /
analyzed: rags snang gi ngo bo med de /
translated: the nature of gross appearances does not exist.

original: drug chas gzhigs na rdul lo //
analyzed: drug chas gzhigs na rdul lo //
translated: If dissected into six parts, there are particles.

original: nyi zer gyi rdul bdun cha la glang rdul /🔽glang rdul bdun cha la lug gi rdul /
analyzed: nyi zer gyi rdul bdun cha la glang rdul / glang rdul bdun cha la lug gi rdul /
translated: Seven particles of sunlight are one ox particle.🔽Seven ox particles are one sheep particle.

original: lug rdul bdun cha la ri bong gi rdul /🔽ri bong gi rdul bdun cha la chu rdul /
analyzed: lug rdul bdun cha la ri bong gi rdul / ri bong gi rdul bdun cha la chu rdul /
translated: Seven sheep particles are one rabbit particle.🔽Seven rabbit particles are one water particle.

original: chu rdul bdun cha la lcags rdul /🔽lcags rdul bdun cha la rdul phra mo /
analyzed: chu rdul bdun cha la lcags rdul / lcags rdul bdun cha la rdul phra mo /
translated: Seven water particles are one iron particle.🔽Seven iron particles are one subtle particle.

original: rdul phra mo bdun cha la rdul phra rab bo //
analyzed: rdul phra mo bdun cha la rdul phra rab bo //
translated: Seven subtle particles are one minute particle.

original: de ltar gzhigs pas phyi rol gyi dngos po thams cad rdzas su ma grub par 'dod do //
analyzed: de ltar gzhigs pas phyi rol gyi dngos po thams cad rdzas su ma grub par 'dod do //
translated: By such dissection, all external things are held to be not substantially established.

analyzed: de la phyogs snga ma mu stegs pa'i gzhung gi rdul phra rab thams cad 'dus pa cha shas gcig tu 'dod do /
translated: The opponent, the scriptures of the tīrthikas, assert that all subtle particles are a single part that is a composite.

original: rdul phra rab cha shas can gcig yin na yul kha dog sngon po la dmigs nas shes pa sngon por skye ba'i dus su dkar po dang / ser po'i kha dog thams cad gcig par thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: rdul phra rab cha shas can gcig yin na yul kha dog sngon po la dmigs nas shes pa sngon por skye ba'i dus su dkar po dang / ser po'i kha dog thams cad gcig par thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: If the subtle atom were a part-possessor, then when the object, the blue color, is observed, and the consciousness arises as blue, it would follow that all the colors, white, yellow, etc., would be the same.

original: gcig pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are the same.

original: de bas na rdul phra rab ma 'dres pa cha shas can g-yag rnga ne'u gsing de'i 'dab 'byor ba mi snang ba'i ngo bor 'dod do //
analyzed: de bas na rdul phra rab ma 'dres pa cha shas can g-yag rnga ne'u gsing de'i 'dab 'byor ba mi snang ba'i ngo bor 'dod do //
translated: Therefore, the subtle atom, which is not mixed, is not part-possessing, and is not the nature of the appearance of the grass-blade on the meadow.

original: 'on te mi snang na yod par cis mngon zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te mi snang na yod par cis mngon zhe na /
translated: But if it does not appear, how is its existence known?

analyzed: 'di mngon sum du rnam pa dang bcas pa'i shes pa yul gyis @166b bskyed cing 'dug pa'i phyir rdul phra rab yod par shes so //
translated: It is known that the subtle atom exists because the consciousness that is generated by the object and that possesses an image exists.

original: bsgom pa gnyis te /
analyzed: bsgom pa gnyis te /

original: goms par bya ba'i dus dang / mngon du bya ba'i dus so //
analyzed: goms par bya ba'i dus dang / mngon du bya ba'i dus so //

analyzed: de la goms par bya ba'i dus ni dang por dbang po yul gyi grong las bzog pa la bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //

analyzed: de la bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog dkar po'i thugs ka ru nyi mar rdo rje'i lte bar h'um bsam mo //

original: de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs kar nyi ma la bsdu'o //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs kar nyi ma la bsdu'o //
translated: Then, the sun is gathered into the heart of Vajrasattva.

original: nyi ma yang rdo rje la'o //
analyzed: nyi ma yang rdo rje la'o //

original: rdo rje h'um la'o //
analyzed: rdo rje h'um la'o //

original: h'um yang de bzhin gshegs pa drug gi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: h'um yang de bzhin gshegs pa drug gi rang bzhin no //

original: zhabs skyed au ni don yod grub pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: zhabs skyed au ni don yod grub pa'i rang bzhin no //

original: lus po ha ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
analyzed: lus po ha ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //

original: mgo bo rin chen 'byung ldan no //
analyzed: mgo bo rin chen 'byung ldan no //
translated: The head of the hūṃ is Ratnasambhava.

original: zla tshes rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: zla tshes rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: The crescent moon is Vairocana.

original: thig le mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: thig le mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: The drop is Akṣobhya.

original: sgra ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: sgra ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //

original: de ltar h'um gi zhabs bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar h'um gi zhabs bskyed pa'o //

analyzed: ha sgra'i bar du rim par thim pas sgra dngos po med par bsgom /
translated: The sound dissolves into the ha, and one meditates that the sound is non-substantial.

original: de ni goms par bya ba'i dus so //
analyzed: de ni goms par bya ba'i dus so //

original: mngon du bya ba ni skad cig la brten nas /
analyzed: mngon du bya ba ni skad cig la brten nas /
translated: The actualization is based on an instant.

original: rdo rje skyil krung bcas nas ni //
analyzed: rdo rje skyil krung bcas nas ni //
translated: Having sat in the vajra posture,

original: sna rtser g-yo ba'i yid gtang la //
analyzed: sna rtser g-yo ba'i yid gtang la //

original: khyim par gyur kyang bsgom par bya //
analyzed: khyim par gyur kyang bsgom par bya //
translated: and meditate, even if one is a householder.

analyzed: zhe'o // de bas na mig gnyis dang sems sna'i rtse mor gtad nas bltas pas cir yang mi dmigs pa de nyid bsgom pa'o //

original: dri ma ni rang sangs rgyas lta bu'o //
analyzed: dri ma ni rang sangs rgyas lta bu'o //
translated: The stain is like a pratyekabuddha.

analyzed: rdul phra rab lta bur chos thams cad mi dmigs pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /

analyzed: des pha rol tu phyin pa lnga mi dmigs pa gsum gyis 'khor gsum yongs su dag par byas nas 'bras bu la re ba med par sems can gyi don byed pa ni lta ba'o //

analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa'i dbang po tham mdor bsdus pa'o //

analyzed: drug gis cig car sbyar bas na //

original: phra rab rdul cha drug tu 'gyur //
analyzed: phra rab rdul cha drug tu 'gyur //

original: drug po dag ni go gcig na //
analyzed: drug po dag ni go gcig na //
translated: If the six are in one place,

analyzed: gong bu'ang rdul phran tsam du 'gyur // zhes pa'i rdul phra rab dag cha shas drug gis gzhigs na rdul du 'gyur te /

analyzed: sems las phyi rol gyi don logs na yod pa ma yin pas sems dang sna tshogs gnyis su med par rigs pas @167a * //
translated: Since external objects do not exist apart from the mind, the mind and the variety are nondual.

original: thams cad de yi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: thams cad de yi rang bzhin no //

analyzed: zhes bya bas sems nyid sna tshogs su snang ba gnyis su med pas rtog pa ma lus pa spang par yid la byed pa ni sgom pa'o //
translated: The investigation of the aspects is the mental attention to the fact that the mind itself appears as the variety of things,🔽and that it is the nature of all things.🔽The investigation of the non-existence of the apprehended

analyzed: sems nyid skad cig ma rtog par 'dod pa ni legs ldan pa'i gzhung ste /
translated: The assertion that the mind itself is momentary and nonconceptual is the system of Bhavaviveka.

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi dri ma'o // rnam pa dang bcas pa'i rnam par rig pa tsam gyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas pha rol tu phyin pa lnga mi dmigs pa gsum gyis 'khor gsum yongs su dag par byas nas bla med byang chub sems can gyi don du spyod pa ni lta
translated: It is a stain on meditative concentration.🔽The view is the practice of the perfection of wisdom of mere consciousness with aspects for the sake of unsurpassable enlightenment and the welfare of sentient beings, having purified the three spheres by means of the three nonapprehensions of the five perfections.

original: 'on te rnam pa bems po yin na shes pa rig pa ma yin la /
analyzed: 'on te rnam pa bems po yin na shes pa rig pa ma yin la /

analyzed: dper na nam mkha' rang bzhin med pa yin na bum pa ma yin /
translated: For example, if space is essenceless, it is not a pot.

original: bum pa yin na nam mkha' ma yin /
analyzed: bum pa yin na nam mkha' ma yin /

analyzed: gzugs can dang gzugs med 'gal ba bzhin du rnam pa bems po yin na shes pa ma yin la /

original: shes ba rig pa yin na rnam pa bems po ma yin te /
analyzed: shes ba rig pa yin na rnam pa bems po ma yin te /
translated: If consciousness is awareness, it is not a material aspect.

analyzed: rnam pa nyid shes pa dang tha mi dad na rnam pa 'dus byas mi rtag pa'i dus su ye shes kyang mi rtag pa ste /

analyzed: 'dus byas su thal bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de las byung ba'i gzugs sku ni //
translated: The rūpakāya that arises from that

original: rjes la sgyu ma bzhin du gnas //🔽zhes bya bas /
analyzed: rjes la sgyu ma bzhin du gnas // zhes bya bas /
translated: subsequently abides like an illusion.

original: mnyam par gzhag pa chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin ni rnam pal stsogs pa phyi'i don gyi spros pa med pa mi rtog pa /
analyzed: mnyam par gzhag pa chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin ni rnam pal stsogs pa phyi'i don gyi spros pa med pa mi rtog pa /
translated: The meditative equipoise that is the nature of the dharmakāya is free from the conceptual elaborations of external objects such as forms. It is nonconceptual.

original: rgyun gyis rtag pa skad cig mas rgyu dang 'bras bur 'dod do //
analyzed: rgyun gyis rtag pa skad cig mas rgyu dang 'bras bur 'dod do //
translated: It is asserted to be permanent in terms of its continuum and momentary in terms of its cause and effect.

original: rjes thob ni rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags kyi stobs kyis 'khrul nas /
analyzed: rjes thob ni rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags kyi stobs kyis 'khrul nas /
translated: In the aftermath state, having been confused by the power of the latent propensities of conceptuality,

original: phyin ci log tu snang ba'i sna tshogs nyid yang dag pa ma yin pa sgyu ma lta bu ste rjes la thob pa'o //
analyzed: phyin ci log tu snang ba'i sna tshogs nyid yang dag pa ma yin pa sgyu ma lta bu ste rjes la thob pa'o //
translated: The variety of appearances, which are erroneous, are not real, but are like illusions. This is the post-attainment.

original: de lta bu'i mnyam gzhag dang rjes thob tu 'dod pa ni so sor rtog pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i mnyam gzhag dang rjes thob tu 'dod pa ni so sor rtog pa'o //
translated: The wish for such meditative equipoise and post-attainment is discernment.

original: yang / 'di dag thams cad sems tsam zhes //
analyzed: yang / 'di dag thams cad sems tsam zhes //
translated: And: All of this is mind only.

original: de ltar du ni shes nas su //
analyzed: de ltar du ni shes nas su //
translated: Knowing it to be so,

original: ci yang rung ste mdun 'jog na //
analyzed: ci yang rung ste mdun 'jog na //
translated: whatever appears in front of you,

original: de nyid tsam la mi gnas so //
analyzed: de nyid tsam la mi gnas so //
translated: do not dwell on it as just that.

original: zhes bya ba'i tshig gis sems nyid gnyis su med par rang rig pa spros pa dang snang ba med pa mngon du byed pa sgom pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i tshig gis sems nyid gnyis su med par rang rig pa spros pa dang snang ba med pa mngon du byed pa sgom pa'o //
translated: This verse teaches that meditation is the realization of the mind itself as nondual, self-aware, free from elaborations and appearances.

original: spros pa med pa rnam pa snang ba med pa'i shes ba rtag par 'dod pa ni nyi ma'i gzhung ste /
analyzed: spros pa med pa rnam pa snang ba med pa'i shes ba rtag par 'dod pa ni nyi ma'i gzhung ste /
translated: The assertion that nonconceptual cognition free from appearances is permanent is the system of Kambala.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi dri ma'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi dri ma'o //
translated: This is a stain of samādhi.

original: rnam pa snang ba med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga mi dmigs pa gsum gyis 'khor gsum yongs su dag par byas nas sems can gyi don byed pa ni lta ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa snang ba med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga mi dmigs pa gsum gyis 'khor gsum yongs su dag par byas nas sems can gyi don byed pa ni lta ba'o //
translated: The view is to benefit sentient beings by means of the five perfections of nonconceptual wisdom, which are purified of the three spheres by means of the three nonapprehensions.

original: 'dir mdo sde pa dang rnal 'byor spyod pa'i snying rje yang chos la dmigs pa'i snying rje ste /
analyzed: 'dir mdo sde pa dang rnal 'byor spyod pa'i snying rje yang chos la dmigs pa'i snying rje ste /
translated: Here, the Sautrāntika and Yogācāra compassion are compassion that focuses on phenomena.

original: dpe chu'i zla ba rlung gis bskyod nas mi rtag pa ltar chos thams cad mi rtag pa'i rlung gis bskyod nas /
analyzed: dpe chu'i zla ba rlung gis bskyod nas mi rtag pa ltar chos thams cad mi rtag pa'i rlung gis bskyod nas /
translated: Like a moon in the water that is moved by the wind, all phenomena are moved by the wind of impermanence.

original: chos thams cad mi rtag pa la dmigs nas snying rje byed pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad mi rtag pa la dmigs nas snying rje byed pa'o //
translated: Having focused on the impermanence of all phenomena, one has compassion.

original: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i grub mtha' mdor bstan pa'o ;
analyzed: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i grub mtha' mdor bstan pa'o ;
translated: This is a brief presentation of the Yogācāra tenets.🔽Now, the tenets of the Mahāyāna Madhyamaka are as follows:

original: / da ni theg pa chen po dbu ma'i grub mtha' ni rnam par rig pa tsam nyid dang don du grub pa ma yin te /
analyzed: / da ni theg pa chen po dbu ma'i grub mtha' ni rnam par rig pa tsam nyid dang don du grub pa ma yin te /
translated: The Madhyamaka are not Proponents of Vijñaptimātra because objects do not exist.

original: rnam pa dang shes pa tha mi dad na rnam pa gcig dang du mas gzhigs na ma grub pa bzhin du sems nyid kyang yang dag par grub par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa dang shes pa tha mi dad na rnam pa gcig dang du mas gzhigs na ma grub pa bzhin du sems nyid kyang yang dag par grub par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If the aspect and consciousness are not different, then just as the aspect is not established when it is analyzed as being either one or many, so too mind itself would not be truly established.

original: gzhan yang yod pa dang med pa las skye ba mi @168a * //
analyzed: gzhan yang yod pa dang med pa las skye ba mi @168a * //
translated: Moreover, arising from what exists or does not exist is untenable.

original: 'thad de / yod pa las skyes pa'i 'bras bu yang skye bar thal ba'am /
analyzed: 'thad de / yod pa las skyes pa'i 'bras bu yang skye bar thal ba'am /
translated: If it arises from what exists, it follows that an effect that has already arisen would arise again.

original: med pa skyen nam mkha'i me tog la stsogs pa yang skye bar thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: med pa skyen nam mkha'i me tog la stsogs pa yang skye bar thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it arises from what does not exist, it follows that even things that do not exist, such as the sky flower, would arise.

original: de bzhin du skad cig ma sngam dang phyi ma las kyang skye ba mi 'thad de /
analyzed: de bzhin du skad cig ma sngam dang phyi ma las kyang skye ba mi 'thad de /
translated: In the same way, arising from a prior or subsequent moment is untenable.

original: snga ma rgyu yod pa'i dus su phyi ma 'bras bu med de /
analyzed: snga ma rgyu yod pa'i dus su phyi ma 'bras bu med de /
translated: At the time when the prior cause exists, the subsequent effect does not exist.

original: phyi ma 'bras bu yod pa'i dus su snga ma rgyu 'gag ste /
analyzed: phyi ma 'bras bu yod pa'i dus su snga ma rgyu 'gag ste /
translated: At the time when the subsequent effect exists, the prior cause has ceased.

original: rdo rje gzegs mas gzhigs nas kyang rgyu 'bras 'brel pa med pa'i nyes pa yod pas skye ba mi rigs so //
analyzed: rdo rje gzegs mas gzhigs nas kyang rgyu 'bras 'brel pa med pa'i nyes pa yod pas skye ba mi rigs so //
translated: Since the fault of the connection between cause and effect would be nonexistent, arising is illogical.

original: klu'i rgyal po ma dros pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo las kyang /
analyzed: klu'i rgyal po ma dros pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo las kyang /
translated: The Mahayana Sutra Requested by the Naga King Anavatapta says:

original: gang zhig rkyan las skyes pa de ma skyes //
analyzed: gang zhig rkyan las skyes pa de ma skyes //
translated: Whatever is arisen from conditions is not arisen.

original: de la skye ba'i rang bzhin yod ma yin //
analyzed: de la skye ba'i rang bzhin yod ma yin //
translated: It does not have the nature of being arisen.

original: rkyen la rag las gang de stong pa yin //
analyzed: rkyen la rag las gang de stong pa yin //
translated: Whatever depends on conditions is empty.

original: gang gis stong nyid shes na mkhas pa yin //
analyzed: gang gis stong nyid shes na mkhas pa yin //
translated: Those who know emptiness are wise.

original: zhe'o // des na rang rig pa nyams su myong ba nyid rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba'i phyir ma skyes pa'o //
analyzed: zhe'o // des na rang rig pa nyams su myong ba nyid rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba'i phyir ma skyes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, because reflexive awareness is dependently arisen, it is not arisen.

original: ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba yod na rkyen la rag ma lus par skye bar thal ba las skye bar ma nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba yod na rkyen la rag ma lus par skye bar thal ba las skye bar ma nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If there were intrinsic arising, it would follow that it would arise without depending on conditions, but it cannot arise in that way.

original: gzhan yang / rnam pa med pa'i shes pa ni //
analyzed: gzhan yang / rnam pa med pa'i shes pa ni //
translated: Moreover, a cognition that lacks an aspect

original: yul la 'dzin par mi rigs te //🔽zhes bya ba'i tshig gis rnam pa med pa'i shes pa skye ru mi rung ste /
analyzed: yul la 'dzin par mi rigs te // zhes bya ba'i tshig gis rnam pa med pa'i shes pa skye ru mi rung ste /
translated: cannot apprehend an object.

original: shes pa med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes pa med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: This line shows that a cognition that lacks an aspect cannot arise because it would follow that it would not be a cognition at all.

original: dber na skye mo mig ma dag la mi mkhas pas nam mkha' la bltas na ma dag pa'i stobs kyis skra shad la sogs par snang la mi mkhas pas yang dag par 'dzin to //
analyzed: dber na skye mo mig ma dag la mi mkhas pas nam mkha' la bltas na ma dag pa'i stobs kyis skra shad la sogs par snang la mi mkhas pas yang dag par 'dzin to //
translated: If one looks at the sky with impure eyes, due to the power of impurity, one sees hairs and so forth. The ignorant grasp them as real.

original: de bzhin du rnam par reg pa tsam yang 'khrul pa'i shes pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam par reg pa tsam yang 'khrul pa'i shes pa ste /
translated: Likewise, mere contact is a deluded cognition.

original: ma rig pa'i stobs kyis sems su snang ba mi mkhas pa yang dag par 'dzin te /
analyzed: ma rig pa'i stobs kyis sems su snang ba mi mkhas pa yang dag par 'dzin te /
translated: Due to the power of ignorance, the appearance as mind is grasped by the ignorant as real.

original: 'khrul pa'i shes pa ni sems su snang na yang don du yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i shes pa ni sems su snang na yang don du yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Although deluded cognition appears as mind, in reality it does not exist.

original: dper na rmi lam sgyu ma nyams su myong bas gong gi rmi lam snga ma brdzun pa bzhin du yang dag par sad na phyi ma nyid kyang brdzun no //
analyzed: dper na rmi lam sgyu ma nyams su myong bas gong gi rmi lam snga ma brdzun pa bzhin du yang dag par sad na phyi ma nyid kyang brdzun no //
translated: For example, just as the previous false dream is false when one truly awakens from the experience of a dream or illusion, so too the later [experience] is false.

original: de bzhin du phyi rol gyi don sna tshogs thams cad sems las logs shig tu ma grub ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du phyi rol gyi don sna tshogs thams cad sems las logs shig tu ma grub ste /
translated: Likewise, all external various objects are not established separately from the mind.

original: brdzun pa bzhin yang dag par brtags na sems la rang bzhin med de brdzun pa nyid do //
analyzed: brdzun pa bzhin yang dag par brtags na sems la rang bzhin med de brdzun pa nyid do //
translated: If one examines them as false, the mind also lacks intrinsic nature and is false.

original: da ni sgyu ma lta bu'i gzhung bshad par bya ste /🔽yod min med min yod med min //
analyzed: da ni sgyu ma lta bu'i gzhung bshad par bya ste / yod min med min yod med min //
translated: Now, the treatise on the illusion-like will be explained.🔽It is neither existent nor non-existent,

original: gnyis ka min pa'ang ma yin pa //
analyzed: gnyis ka min pa'ang ma yin pa //
translated: nor both existent and non-existent,🔽nor even not both existent and non-existent.🔽The Madhyamika knows that reality

original: mtha' bzhi las ni rnam grol ba //🔽de nyid dbu ma pa yis rig / ces bya bas /
analyzed: mtha' bzhi las ni rnam grol ba // de nyid dbu ma pa yis rig / ces bya bas /
translated: is free from the four extremes.

original: yod pa ma yin pa ni gcig dang du ma'i sbyor bas @168b gnod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yod pa ma yin pa ni gcig dang du ma'i sbyor bas @168b gnod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not existent because it is invalidated by the argument of the one and the many.

original: med pa ma yin pa ni snang ba nyams su myong ba yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med pa ma yin pa ni snang ba nyams su myong ba yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not non-existent because the experience of appearance exists.

original: gnyis ka ma yin pa ni gnyis ka la skyon yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyis ka ma yin pa ni gnyis ka la skyon yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not both because each has a fault.

original: gnyis ka ma yin pa yang ma yin pa ni rgyu med pa mi srid pa dang / phung po gsum pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyis ka ma yin pa yang ma yin pa ni rgyu med pa mi srid pa dang / phung po gsum pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not even not both because a non-cause is impossible and a third alternative does not exist.

original: de bas na mtha' bzhi las grol ba'i sgyu ma lta ba'i shes pa 'od gsal bar 'dod de /
analyzed: de bas na mtha' bzhi las grol ba'i sgyu ma lta ba'i shes pa 'od gsal bar 'dod de /
translated: Therefore, the illusion-like consciousness, free from the four extremes, is asserted to be clear light.

original: de yang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu mya ngan las 'das pa las ches lhag pa'i chos yod na yang de yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o zhes gsungs pas /
analyzed: de yang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu mya ngan las 'das pa las ches lhag pa'i chos yod na yang de yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o zhes gsungs pas /
translated: Furthermore, even the phenomena of nirvana are like an illusion, like a dream. Even if there were phenomena superior to nirvana, they too would be like an illusion, like a dream.

original: sna tshogs dang sems nyid sgyu ma lta bur gnyis su med pa ni so sor rtog pa'o /
analyzed: sna tshogs dang sems nyid sgyu ma lta bur gnyis su med pa ni so sor rtog pa'o /
translated: The non-duality of the variety and the illusion-like nature of mind itself is discernment.

original: sna tshogs thams cad chu zla'am me long gi gzugs brnyan ltar bden pa ma yin la brdzun pa yang ma yin par sgyu ma lta bur gnyis su med par 'jig pa ni bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs thams cad chu zla'am me long gi gzugs brnyan ltar bden pa ma yin la brdzun pa yang ma yin par sgyu ma lta bur gnyis su med par 'jig pa ni bsgom pa'o //
translated: The meditation is the destruction of the non-duality of the variety and the illusion-like nature of mind, in that the whole variety is like the reflection in a mirror or the moon in water, neither true nor false, like an illusion.

original: chad par zhen pa ni sgom pa'i dri ma'o //
analyzed: chad par zhen pa ni sgom pa'i dri ma'o //
translated: The meditation defilement is the adherence to nihilism.

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas pha rol tu phyin pa lnga mi dmigs pa gsum gyis 'khor gsum yongs su dag par sbyad nas sems can gyi don byed pa ni lta ba'o //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas pha rol tu phyin pa lnga mi dmigs pa gsum gyis 'khor gsum yongs su dag par sbyad nas sems can gyi don byed pa ni lta ba'o //
translated: The view is the performance of the benefit of sentient beings by means of the illusion-like perfection of wisdom, the five perfections being unapprehended by means of the three non-apprehensions, and by means of the purification of the three spheres.

original: gzhan yang chos thams cad rab tu mi dmigs pas sgyu ma lta bu nyid ma grub par 'dod de /
analyzed: gzhan yang chos thams cad rab tu mi dmigs pas sgyu ma lta bu nyid ma grub par 'dod de /
translated: Moreover, since all phenomena are not at all apprehended, you assert that illusion-like is not established.

original: de yang 'di skad du /
analyzed: de yang 'di skad du /
translated: And that is stated as follows:

original: gsal lam mi gsal yang rung ste //
analyzed: gsal lam mi gsal yang rung ste //
translated: Whether clear or unclear,

original: sus kyang ji bzhin ma mthong bas //
analyzed: sus kyang ji bzhin ma mthong bas //
translated: since no one sees it as it is,

original: mo gsham gyi ni bu bzhin du //
analyzed: mo gsham gyi ni bu bzhin du //
translated: like the son of a barren woman,

original: brjod du zin kyang don med de //🔽zhas bya bas sgyu ma lta bu nyid 'od gsal lam /
analyzed: brjod du zin kyang don med de // zhas bya bas sgyu ma lta bu nyid 'od gsal lam /
translated: even if expressed, it is meaningless.

original: 'on te sems las gzhan zhen /
analyzed: 'on te sems las gzhan zhen /
translated: Thus, is illusion-like clarity or is it other than mind?

original: sems las gzhan pa'i chos ni ma grub la /
analyzed: sems las gzhan pa'i chos ni ma grub la /
translated: A phenomenon that is other than mind is not established.

original: sems nyid yin na sems nyid ma grub pa'i dus su sgyu ma nyid kyang mi 'grub po //
analyzed: sems nyid yin na sems nyid ma grub pa'i dus su sgyu ma nyid kyang mi 'grub po //
translated: If it is mind itself, when mind itself is not established, illusion-like is not established.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sems nyid las gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems nyid las gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is nothing other than mind itself.

original: sgyu ma lta bu yang mi mkhas pa'i shes pa ste /
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu yang mi mkhas pa'i shes pa ste /
translated: Also, illusion-like is the consciousness of the unwise,

original: sgro 'dogs skur ba 'debs pa ste /
analyzed: sgro 'dogs skur ba 'debs pa ste /
translated: the superimposition and denial

original: dper na skyes bu ma dag pas mig nam mkha' la bltas na mig ma dag pa'i stobs kyis zla ba gnyis pa dang / skra'i 'khor lo la sogs pa snang zhes sgro 'dogs la mkhas pa'i shes pas snang ma thag tu med par shes te /
analyzed: dper na skyes bu ma dag pas mig nam mkha' la bltas na mig ma dag pa'i stobs kyis zla ba gnyis pa dang / skra'i 'khor lo la sogs pa snang zhes sgro 'dogs la mkhas pa'i shes pas snang ma thag tu med par shes te /
translated: With a consciousness skilled in refutation, as soon as they appear, they are known to be nonexistent, and they say,

original: med do zhes skur ba 'debs so //
analyzed: med do zhes skur ba 'debs so //
translated: “They do not exist.”

original: de bzhin du sgyu ma lta bu yang las dang ma rig pa'i dbang gis snang tshogs su snang ngo zhes sgro btags la /
analyzed: de bzhin du sgyu ma lta bu yang las dang ma rig pa'i dbang gis snang tshogs su snang ngo zhes sgro btags la /
translated: Likewise, also the illusion-like is said to be the appearance of the collection of appearances due to the power of karma and ignorance.

original: mkhas pa'i stobs kyis snang ma thag tu stong ste /
analyzed: mkhas pa'i stobs kyis snang ma thag tu stong ste /
translated: With the power of skill, as soon as they appear, they are empty.

original: sgyu ma lta bu zhes skur pa 'debs so //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu zhes skur pa 'debs so //
translated: They say, “They are illusion-like,” and they refute.

original: @169a * // de bas na sgro 'dogs pa dang skur ba 'debs pa'i mtha' la gnas so //
analyzed: @169a * // de bas na sgro 'dogs pa dang skur ba 'debs pa'i mtha' la gnas so //
translated: Therefore, they abide in the extremes of superimposition and denial.

original: de nas gzhan yang chos thams cad rab tu mi gnas pa'i mthar smra bar 'dod pas 'di skad du /
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang chos thams cad rab tu mi gnas pa'i mthar smra bar 'dod pas 'di skad du /
translated: Next, those who wish to speak about the nonabiding extreme of all phenomena say this:

original: sna tshogs rtag pa ma yin te //
analyzed: sna tshogs rtag pa ma yin te //
translated: The variety is not permanent,

original: chad par yang ni khas mi len //
analyzed: chad par yang ni khas mi len //
translated: and one should not accept annihilation.

original: rtag dang chad pa gnyis ka dang // gnyis ka min pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: rtag dang chad pa gnyis ka dang // gnyis ka min pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: Nor is it both or neither.🔽Here, the wise know the reality of things

original: 'dir ni thams cad mi gnas par //
analyzed: 'dir ni thams cad mi gnas par //
translated: As not abiding in any of these ways.🔽Therefore, the mind that is conceptual

original: dngos po'i de nyid mkhas pas rig / des na 'di lta'i rnam rtog gi / sems ni sems kyis rig ma yin //🔽ji srid sgro 'dogs thams cad ni //
analyzed: dngos po'i de nyid mkhas pas rig / des na 'di lta'i rnam rtog gi / sems ni sems kyis rig ma yin // ji srid sgro 'dogs thams cad ni //
translated: Is not known by the mind.🔽As long as all superimpositions

original: de kun thams cad du med pas //
analyzed: de kun thams cad du med pas //
translated: Do not exist in any way,

original: dbu ma'i don la sgro 'dogs med //
analyzed: dbu ma'i don la sgro 'dogs med //
translated: There are no superimpositions on the meaning of the middle

original: des na dgag dang sgrub pa med //
analyzed: des na dgag dang sgrub pa med //
translated: And therefore no refutations or affirmations.

original: ces bya ba dang / gzhan nas kyang /🔽'di la bsal bya ci yang med //
analyzed: ces bya ba dang / gzhan nas kyang / 'di la bsal bya ci yang med //
translated: And also elsewhere:🔽There is nothing at all to be removed

original: gzhag par bya ba gang yang med //🔽yang dag nyid la yang dag lta //
analyzed: gzhag par bya ba gang yang med // yang dag nyid la yang dag lta //
translated: And not the slightest thing to be added.🔽See reality in reality.

original: yang dag mthong na rnam par grol //
analyzed: yang dag mthong na rnam par grol //
translated: When reality is seen, one is liberated.

original: zhes bya bas yod pa'i sgro 'dogs dang med pa'i skur pa 'debs pa la mi gnas te /
analyzed: zhes bya bas yod pa'i sgro 'dogs dang med pa'i skur pa 'debs pa la mi gnas te /
translated: Thus, one does not abide in the superimposition of existence or the denial of nonexistence.

original: sems nyid sna tshogs su myong ba nyid rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas nam skyes pa ste /
analyzed: sems nyid sna tshogs su myong ba nyid rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas nam skyes pa ste /
translated: The mind itself experiencing diversity arises through dependent origination.

original: ma skyes pa nyid skye ba ltar snang ste /
analyzed: ma skyes pa nyid skye ba ltar snang ste /
translated: Although it does not arise, it appears as if it does.

original: skye ba dang skye ba med pa gnyi ga tha mi dang do //
analyzed: skye ba dang skye ba med pa gnyi ga tha mi dang do //
translated: Arising and non-arising are not different.

original: de bzhin du snang ba nyid rigs pas brtags na stong pa yin la /
analyzed: de bzhin du snang ba nyid rigs pas brtags na stong pa yin la /
translated: In the same way, when appearance itself is examined with reasoning, it is emptiness.

original: stong pa ma grub pa rigs pas brtag mi bzod pa nyid snang ba'o//🔽snang ba nyid las kyang stong pa gzhan ma yin la /
analyzed: stong pa ma grub pa rigs pas brtag mi bzod pa nyid snang ba'o// snang ba nyid las kyang stong pa gzhan ma yin la /
translated: And emptiness, which cannot withstand the examination of reasoning, is appearance.🔽Appearance is not different from emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid las kyang snang ba gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: stong pa nyid las kyang snang ba gzhan ma yin no //
translated: And emptiness is not different from appearance.

original: dper na smig rgyu la chur snang ba nyid la chu yis stong la /
analyzed: dper na smig rgyu la chur snang ba nyid la chu yis stong la /
translated: For example, in a mirage, the appearance of water is empty of water.

original: chu med pa nyid chur snang ste /
analyzed: chu med pa nyid chur snang ste /
translated: And the absence of water is the appearance of water.

original: chur snang ba dang chu med pa gnyis tha dad pa ma yin na //
analyzed: chur snang ba dang chu med pa gnyis tha dad pa ma yin na //
translated: The appearance of water and the absence of water are not different.

original: de bzhin du snang ba nyid na rang bzhin med la /
analyzed: de bzhin du snang ba nyid na rang bzhin med la /
translated: In the same way, when there is appearance, there is no intrinsic nature.

original: rang bzhin med pa nyid snang ba'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa nyid snang ba'o //
translated: And the absence of intrinsic nature is appearance.

original: snang ba dang rang bzhin med pa stong pa nyid ni tha mi dad do //
analyzed: snang ba dang rang bzhin med pa stong pa nyid ni tha mi dad do //
translated: Appearance and the emptiness that is the absence of intrinsic nature are not different.

original: dper na bud sheng du ma mes bsregs na me'i ngo bor gcig ste /
analyzed: dper na bud sheng du ma mes bsregs na me'i ngo bor gcig ste /
translated: For example, when a fire burns many logs, they become one with the nature of fire.

original: de nas bud shing zad pa dang me nyid mi gnas so //
analyzed: de nas bud shing zad pa dang me nyid mi gnas so //
translated: Then, when the logs are exhausted, the fire itself does not remain.

original: de bzhin du sna tshogs su snang ba nyid rigs pas stong pa nyid du byas nas dngos ngo ma grub pa dang stong pa nyid kyang mi gnas so //
analyzed: de bzhin du sna tshogs su snang ba nyid rigs pas stong pa nyid du byas nas dngos ngo ma grub pa dang stong pa nyid kyang mi gnas so //
translated: Likewise, having made the various appearances empty by means of reasoning, the non-establishment of entities and emptiness itself do not abide.

original: de bzhin du gnyis su mi gnas pa yang gnyis su ma grub pa'i tshe na gnyis su med pa yang mi 'grub bo //🔽de bas na gzhan gyi zhen pa bzlog pa'am /🔽sgro skur gcad pa'am /
analyzed: de bzhin du gnyis su mi gnas pa yang gnyis su ma grub pa'i tshe na gnyis su med pa yang mi 'grub bo // de bas na gzhan gyi zhen pa bzlog pa'am / sgro skur gcad pa'am /
translated: Likewise, non-abiding in duality is also not established when duality is not established.🔽Therefore, emptiness and non-arising are expressed for the sake of refuting the attachments of others,

original: drad pa'i don du stong pa dang skye ba med pa zhes brjod kyi /🔽@169b mkhas pas btsal ba'am /
analyzed: drad pa'i don du stong pa dang skye ba med pa zhes brjod kyi / @169b mkhas pas btsal ba'am /
translated: cutting through exaggeration and denigration,🔽and for the sake of the explicit meaning.🔽However, the wise do not abide in this

original: nges pa'i don du di nyid mi gnas te /
analyzed: nges pa'i don du di nyid mi gnas te /
translated: in the definitive meaning.

original: rnam gcod dang / yongs gcod dang / sgro 'dogs dang / skur ba 'debs pa yang mi gnas la /
analyzed: rnam gcod dang / yongs gcod dang / sgro 'dogs dang / skur ba 'debs pa yang mi gnas la /
translated: Exclusion, inclusion, exaggeration, and denigration do not abide,

original: zhen pa med cing dgag pa dang / sgrub pa med la mnyam gzhag dang rjes thob gnyis su med cing mi gnas pa ni so sor rtog pa'o //
analyzed: zhen pa med cing dgag pa dang / sgrub pa med la mnyam gzhag dang rjes thob gnyis su med cing mi gnas pa ni so sor rtog pa'o //
translated: and non-attachment, negation, and affirmation are non-abiding and non-dual in equipoise and post-equipoise. This is discernment.

original: sgro skur dang zhen pa med par yid la byed pa med pa ni sgom pa'o //
analyzed: sgro skur dang zhen pa med par yid la byed pa med pa ni sgom pa'o //
translated: Meditation is the non-attention which is free from superimposition and negation, and free from attachment.

original: don thams cad chad par lta zhing nyams su myong ba med pas bems por gyur pa ni sgom pa'i dri ma'o //
analyzed: don thams cad chad par lta zhing nyams su myong ba med pas bems por gyur pa ni sgom pa'i dri ma'o //
translated: The defilement of meditation is the state of being like a block of wood, which is the result of the view that all things are annihilated, and the absence of experience.

original: sgro skur med pa dang / zhen pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas pha rol tu phyin pa lnga mi dmigs pa gsum gyis 'khor gsum yongs su dag bas sems can gyi don byed pa ni lta ba'o //
analyzed: sgro skur med pa dang / zhen pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas pha rol tu phyin pa lnga mi dmigs pa gsum gyis 'khor gsum yongs su dag bas sems can gyi don byed pa ni lta ba'o //
translated: The view is the activity for the benefit of sentient beings, by means of the perfection of wisdom which is free from superimposition and negation, and free from attachment, and by means of the non-apprehension of the five perfections, through the threefold purity.

original: dper na skye bo mig dag ba mkhas pa cig nam mkha' la lta ba na mig dag pas skra'i 'khor lo la sogs pa ci yang mi dmigs la /
analyzed: dper na skye bo mig dag ba mkhas pa cig nam mkha' la lta ba na mig dag pas skra'i 'khor lo la sogs pa ci yang mi dmigs la /
translated: For example, when a person with clear eyes looks at the sky, he does not apprehend anything, such as a circle of hair, because his eyes are clear.

original: mkhas pas yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar sgro 'dogs pa'am skur ba 'debs par mi byed do //
analyzed: mkhas pas yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar sgro 'dogs pa'am skur ba 'debs par mi byed do //
translated: The wise one does not superimpose or negate, saying that it exists or that it does not exist.

original: de bzhin du chos thams cad rang bzhin du ma skyes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis yod med gang yang mi gnas pas yod med kyi sgro skur gad du yang mi gnas pa ni de kho na nyid kyi shes pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du chos thams cad rang bzhin du ma skyes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis yod med gang yang mi gnas pas yod med kyi sgro skur gad du yang mi gnas pa ni de kho na nyid kyi shes pa'o //
translated: Likewise, all things do not abide in any way as either existent or nonexistent, because of the nature of not being born as a nature. The knowledge of thatness is the non-abiding of exaggeration and denigration as either existent or nonexistent.

original: sgyu ma lta bu dang rab tu mi gnas pa'i snying rje yang dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje ste /
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu dang rab tu mi gnas pa'i snying rje yang dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje ste /
translated: Also, illusion-like and thoroughly non-abiding compassion is non-referential compassion.

original: chos thams cad cir yang mi dmigs par yid la byed pas na mi dmigs pa'i snying rje'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad cir yang mi dmigs par yid la byed pas na mi dmigs pa'i snying rje'o //
translated: Since all phenomena are brought to mind without any reference whatsoever, it is non-referential compassion.

original: theg pa chen po mdor bstan pa'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po mdor bstan pa'o //
translated: This concludes the summary of the Mahāyāna.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa'i grub pa'i mtha' ma lus par mdor bsdus te bstan pa'o //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa'i grub pa'i mtha' ma lus par mdor bsdus te bstan pa'o //
translated: This concludes the teaching that summarizes all the tenets of the Pāramitāyāna.

original: de nas gzhan yang 'bras bu rdo rje'i theg pa brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang 'bras bu rdo rje'i theg pa brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now, the result Vajrayāna will be explained.

original: de yang 'di skad du /🔽don gcig na yang ma rmongs dang // thabs mang dka' ba med pa dang // dbang po rnon po'i dbang byas pas //
analyzed: de yang 'di skad du / don gcig na yang ma rmongs dang // thabs mang dka' ba med pa dang // dbang po rnon po'i dbang byas pas //
translated: And this is stated:🔽Though having the same meaning, the Mantra Vehicle is superior🔽Because of non-confusion, many methods, no hardship,

original: sngags kyi theg pa khyad par 'phags //
analyzed: sngags kyi theg pa khyad par 'phags //
translated: And being for those with sharp faculties.

original: zhes gsungs pas don de kho na nyid la dbye ba med kyang pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa ni rmongs pa sta /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pas don de kho na nyid la dbye ba med kyang pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa ni rmongs pa sta /
translated: vehicle of the perfections is for the confused.🔽It is realized through

analyzed: lung dang regs pas gtan la phab ste rtogs pa'o //
translated: establishing it with scripture and logic.🔽The Vajra Vehicle is for the

original: rdo rje theg pa ni ma rmongs pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje theg pa ni ma rmongs pa ste /
translated: unconfused.🔽It is experienced through scripture, logic, and the

analyzed: lung dang rigs pa dang / bla ma'i man ngag gis nyams su myong ba'o //
translated: guru’s instructions.

original: gzhan yang dka' ba med pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang dka' ba med pa ste /
translated: Moreover, it is without difficulty.

original: bde ba chen po lam du byed pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba chen po lam du byed pa'o //
translated: It is the path of great bliss.

analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa ni btang snyoms pa dang nyams su myong ba @170a * //
translated: The vehicle of the perfections is indifferent and without experience.

original: med pa'o // rgyu lam du byed pas na rgyu'i theg pa'o //
analyzed: med pa'o // rgyu lam du byed pas na rgyu'i theg pa'o //
translated: Since it takes the cause as the path, it is the causal vehicle.

original: 'bras bu lam du byed pas na 'bras bu'i theg pa khyad du 'phags so //
analyzed: 'bras bu lam du byed pas na 'bras bu'i theg pa khyad du 'phags so //
translated: Since it takes the result as the path, the resultant vehicle is superior.

original: rdo rje theg pa la yang gsum ste /
analyzed: rdo rje theg pa la yang gsum ste /
translated: There are also three in the Vajra Vehicle:

original: rgyu'i rgyud dang / thabs kyi rgyud dang / 'bras bu'i rgyud do //
analyzed: rgyu'i rgyud dang / thabs kyi rgyud dang / 'bras bu'i rgyud do //
translated: the causal tantra, the method tantra, and the resultant tantra.

original: de yang 'di skad du /
analyzed: de yang 'di skad du /
translated: It is said:

original: rgyud ces bya ba rgyun yin te /
analyzed: rgyud ces bya ba rgyun yin te /
translated: A tantra is a continuum.

original: rgyu da kyi don ni gsum yin te //
analyzed: rgyu da kyi don ni gsum yin te //
translated: The meaning of tantra has three aspects.🔽Cause, nature, and effect,

original: rgyu dang rang bzhin 'bras bu dang // thabs dang rnam pa gsum yin te //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rgyu dang rang bzhin 'bras bu dang // thabs dang rnam pa gsum yin te // zhes gsungs so //
translated: method and aspect are the three.

original: rgyu'i rgyud ni rdo rje 'chang gi rigs can gyi sems can no //
analyzed: rgyu'i rgyud ni rdo rje 'chang gi rigs can gyi sems can no //
translated: The causal continuum is a sentient being who has the potential of Vajradhara.

analyzed: 'bras bu'i rgyud ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub po //

original: thabs kyi rgyud la lnga ste /
analyzed: thabs kyi rgyud la lnga ste /
translated: The method continuum has five aspects:

original: bya ba'i rgyud dang / spyod pa'i rgyud dang ; rnal 'byor gyi rgyud dang ; rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud dang / rnal 'byor gong na med pa'i rgyud do //
analyzed: bya ba'i rgyud dang / spyod pa'i rgyud dang ; rnal 'byor gyi rgyud dang ; rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud dang / rnal 'byor gong na med pa'i rgyud do //
translated: action tantra, conduct tantra, yoga tantra, highest yoga tantra, and unsurpassed yoga tantra.

analyzed: de dag las rnal 'byor gyi rgyud dang / rnal 'byor bla na mad pa'i rgyud la sogs pa nas rim pa gnyis su gsungs so //

analyzed: de yang dgyes pa'i rdo rje las /
translated: Moreover, the Hevajra Tantra states:🔽The two stages are the stage of generation

original: zhes gsungs pas /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pas /

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa gnyis te /
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa gnyis te /

analyzed: phyi bskyed pa'i rim pa dang ; nang zab mo bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa gsum ste /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa gsum ste /

analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa dang / yongs su rdzogs pa'i rim pa dang / ngo bo nyid kyi rim pa'o //

analyzed: slob dpon gyi dbang dang ; gsang ba'i dbang dang / shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ngo /

original: ma bcos pa la gnyis te /
analyzed: ma bcos pa la gnyis te /

analyzed: chos kyi phyag rgya dang / phyag rgya chen po bzhi pa'o //
translated: the great seal of the doctrine and the great seal of the great seal.

original: de yang 'di skad du /
analyzed: de yang 'di skad du /
translated: Moreover, it is said:

original: slob dpon dbang ni dang po ste //
analyzed: slob dpon dbang ni dang po ste //
translated: The master empowerment is the first;

original: gsad ba mchog ni gnyis pa yin //
analyzed: gsad ba mchog ni gnyis pa yin //
translated: the supreme killing is the second;

original: gsum pa shes rab ye shes te //
analyzed: gsum pa shes rab ye shes te //
translated: the third is the wisdom-awareness;

original: bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no //🔽zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no //🔽zhes gsungs te /

analyzed: bzhi pa ni man ngag ste /

original: byang chub sems kyi sa bon no //

analyzed: de la dbang po rab 'bring tha ma'i dbang du byas nas /

analyzed: slob @170b dpon gyi dbang dang / bskyed pa'i rim pa lha'i rnal 'byor ro //
translated: The master initiation and the creation stage are the yoga of the deity.

original: dbang po tha ma'i las kyi phyag rgya la gnyis te /
analyzed: dbang po tha ma'i las kyi phyag rgya la gnyis te /
translated: The lowest faculty has two types of action seals.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs dbung ba dang / rdo rje 'chang gi dbugs dbyung ba'o //
translated: There is the relief of the tathāgatas and the relief of Vajradhara.

analyzed: rdo rje 'chang gi dbugs dbyung ba ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba dang / rdo rje 'chang gi dbyugs dbyung ba ni las kyi phyag rgya ste /

translated: This is for those of the highest of superior faculties.🔽Next, the outer stage of development, the empowerment of the vajra master, will be explained.
